description: The downstream transmit rate has changed.

event.Summary: Downstream transmit rate has changed from $v3 to $v2

description: Identifies the interface number assigned to this bonding
group and is used to identify corresponding rows in the
interfaces MIB.
variables.name: PDN-DSL-ATM-BOND-MIB::pdnDslAtmBondGroupIfIndex

description: The current net data rate the bonding group has achieved
for the downstream direction.
variables.name: PDN-DSL-ATM-BOND-MIB::pdnDslAtmBondPerfCurrAtucNetDataRate

description: The previous net data rate the bonding group had
achieved for the downstream direction. This value is
set at initialization to prevent a notification from
being sent.
variables.name: PDN-DSL-ATM-BOND-MIB::pdnDslAtmBondPerfPrevAtucNetDataRate

description: The upstream transmit rate has changed.

event.Summary: Upstream transmit rate has changed from $v3 to $v2

description: Identifies the interface number assigned to this bonding
group and is used to identify corresponding rows in the
interfaces MIB.
variables.name: PDN-DSL-ATM-BOND-MIB::pdnDslAtmBondGroupIfIndex

description: The current net data rate the bonding group has achieved
for the upstream direction.
variables.name: PDN-DSL-ATM-BOND-MIB::pdnDslAtmBondPerfCurrAturNetDataRate

description: The previous net data rate the bonding group had
achieved for the upstream direction. This value is
set at initialization to prevent a notification from
being sent.
variables.name: PDN-DSL-ATM-BOND-MIB::pdnDslAtmBondPerfPrevAturNetDataRate

description: The operational status of the group has changed.

event.Summary: ATM bond group $v1 status is $v2 (failure reason: $v3)

description: Identifies the interface number assigned to this bonding
group and is used to identify corresponding rows in the
interfaces MIB.
variables.name: PDN-DSL-ATM-BOND-MIB::pdnDslAtmBondGroupIfIndex

description: The status of the bonding group.
variables.name: PDN-DSL-ATM-BOND-MIB::pdnDslAtmBondPerfGroupStatus

description: The reason the operational status of the bonding group
is not `operational'.
variables.name: PDN-DSL-ATM-BOND-MIB::pdnDslAtmBondPerfFailReason
